quote: When I cry - when I let myself cry - that's who I cry for. I don't cry for myself. I cry for the Cassie that's gone.And I wonder what that Cassie would think of me.The Cassie who kills.
quote_letters: WHEN I CRY - WHEN I LET MYSELF CRY - THATS WHO I CRY FOR I DONT CRY FOR MYSELF I CRY FOR THE CASSIE THATS GONEAND I WONDER WHAT THAT CASSIE WOULD THINK OF METHE CASSIE WHO KILLS
